1.0.name: wordpress/viral-coupon-for-wp-e-commerce-lite
1.0.description:
This plugin allows the customer to "Like" on Facebook about your store during Checkout & earn a discount. This plugin can lead to exponential growth in sales as each & every customer is given an incentive to promote your store.

What better way to market your site than word of mouth!

Benefits:

  • Your store will be shared on your customer's Facebook wall.
  • You will start to build social backlinks which will in turn help your site's SEO.
  • Increase your traffic by going viral!
  • More Likes = More visibility
  • Fully Integrated With WP e-Commerce

Friends are 300-500% more likely to buy products, specially when recommended. All it takes is someone purchasing from your store and sharing it one time then... BOOM, you're getting viral traffic over and over and over again.
